Name: ASCENT BATTERIES
checklistText:
<size=21>ASCENT BATTERY ACTIVATION & CHECKOUT</size>

1.
PANEL 11:
	CB EPS:
		ASC ECA CONT - close
		ASC ECA - close

2.
PANEL 16:
	CB EPS:
		ASC ECA - close
		ASC ECA CONT - close

3. Check lunar battery and place both ascent batteries on line:
PANEL 14:
	EPS:
		POWER/TEMP MON sel - LUNAR BAT
		VOLTS ind - 37.0 to 37.2 vdc
		AMPS ind - 0 amp
		LMP LUNAR BAT sw - OFF/RESET; tb - bp; then, ON; tb - LMP
		POWER/TEMP MON sel - LUNAR BAT
		VOLTS ind - 28.0 to 32.5 vdc
		AMPS ind - TBD
		LMP LUNAR BAT sw - OFF/RESET; tb - bp
		POWER/TEMP MON sel - BAT 5
		VOLTS ind - 37.0 to 37.2 vdc
		AMPS ind - 0 amp
		BAT 5 NORMAL LMP FEED sw - ON; tb - gray
		VOLTS ind - 28.0 to 32.5 vdc
		AMPS ind - TBD
		LMP BAT 1 HI V sw - OFF/RESET; tb - bp
		CDR LUNAR BAT sw - OFF/RESET; tb - bp, then ON; tb - CDR
		POWER/TEMP MON sel - LUNAR BAT
		VOLTS ind - 28.0 to 32.5 vdc
		AMPS ind - TBD
		CDR LUNAR BAT sw - OFF/RESET; tb - bp
		POWER/TEMP MODE sel - BAT 6
		VOLTS ind - 37.0 to 37.2 vdc
		AMPS ind - 0 amp
		BAT 6 NORMAL CDR FEED sw - ON; tb - gray
		VOLTS int - 28.0 to 32.5 vdc
		AMPS ind - TBD
		CDR BAT 4 HI V sw - OFF/RESET; tb - bp
		PWR/TEMP MON sel - LMP bus, then CDR bus
		VOLTS ind - 26.5 to 32.5 vdc

				CAUTION
			To avoid transients, remove descent
			batteries, one at a time, from line at
			intervals of no less than 3 sec.
		
4. Check backup feed path from both ascent batteries:
	EPS:
		BAT 5 BACK UP CDR FEED sw - ON; tb - gray
		BAT 6 BACK UP LMP FEED sw - ON; tb - gray
		BAT 5 NORMAL LMP FEED sw - OFF/RESET; tb - bp
		BAT 6 NORMAL CDR FEED sw - OFF/RESET; tb - bp
		POWER/TEMP MON sel - CDR BUS then LMP bus
		VOLTS ind - 26.5 to 32.5 vdc

5. Place all four descent batteries on line:
	EPS:
		LMP BAT 1 HI VOLT & 2 sw - ON; tb - gray
		CDR BAT 3 and 5 HI VOLT sw - ON; tb -gray
		POWER/TEMP MON sel - BAT 1
		AMPS ind - TBD
		Repeat for BAT 2, BAT3 & BAT 4

6. Remove both ascent batteries from line:
	EPS:
		BAT 5 BACK UP CDR FEED sw - OFF/RESET; tb - bp
		BAT 6 BACK UP SE FEED sw - OFF/RESET; tb - bp

Electrical Power Subsystem is now in normal descent battery configuration.

7.
PANEL 16:	CB EPS: ASC ECA CONT - open

8.
PANEL 11:	CB EPS: ASC ECA CONT - open
